hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT sub.id, sub.createrId, sub.createTime, sub.content, sub.flag, sub.departmentId, sub.title, sub.moduleId, sub.lastUpdateTime, sub.parentId, sub.createrName FROM t_sm2_subject AS sub, ( SELECT sub_id as subId FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid ) subIds WHERE sub.id = subIds.subId AND sub.moduleId = :moduleId ORDER BY sub.lastUpdateTime DESC
SELECT COUNT(sub.id) FROM t_sm2_subject AS sub, ( SELECT sub_id as subId FROM t_sm2_subject_master WHERE user_uid = :uid ) subIds WHERE sub.id = subIds.subId AND sub.moduleId = :moduleId
SELECT COUNT(trans.id) FROM t_sm2_subject_trans trans , ( SELECT subjectId subId FROM t_sm2_step WHERE id=:stepId) step WHERE trans.sub_id = step.subId AND trans.user_uid = :uid ;
